title: How to Make Barbecue Sauce (Tangy and Sweet With a Little Heat)

steps.headline: Put a few tablespoons of olive oil in a deep saucepan.
Add the 1/4 cup chopped celery, 1/4 cup onions, 1/4 cup green peppers, and a clove of sliced garlic.
When the garlic begins to turn light brown, add 1/4 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup of ketchup, a 12 oz.
steps.description: can of tomato sauce. Add 1 tablespoon of smoked paprika and a tablespoon of chili powder.

steps.headline: Add 1/2 teaspoon of Hungarian paprika, a pinch of cumin, a dash of cayenne powder, 1 tablespoon of Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon of liquid smoke, 1 tablespoon of brown sugar and 1 tablespoon of apple cider vinegar.
Add 1 teaspoon of Dijon mustard, and simmer for 35 minutes.
Add 4 tablespoons of relish for extra sweetness and flavor, if desired.

text: Put a few tablespoons of olive oil in a deep saucepan.  Add the 1/4 cup chopped celery, 1/4 cup onions, 1/4 cup green peppers, and a clove of sliced garlic.  When the garlic begins to turn light brown, add 1/4 cup diced tomatoes, 1/4 cup of ketchup, a 12 oz. can of tomato sauce. Add 1 tablespoon of smoked paprika and a tablespoon of chili powder. Add 1/2 teaspoon of Hungarian paprika, a pinch of cumin, a dash of cayenne powder, 1 tablespoon of Worcestershire sauce, 1 tablespoon of liquid smoke, 1 tablespoon of brown sugar and 1 tablespoon of apple cider vinegar.  Add 1 teaspoon of Dijon mustard, and simmer for 35 minutes.  Add 4 tablespoons of relish for extra sweetness and flavor, if desired.  Finished.
